top_positive_examples: ["Very satisfied — feature set and battery life meet my daily needs.", "Battery easily lasts all day even with heavy use — very impressed.", "Excellent battery backup — really handy when traveling."]

top_positive_examples: ["Exceeded expectations — smooth day-to-day performance and solid battery life.", "Performance is good, but the phone feels warm after extended use.", "Amazing performance — runs games and heavy apps without hiccups."]

top_positive_examples: ["Fantastic camera software — photos look great straight out of the phone.", "Versatile camera system produces great results in most lighting situations.", "Camera performance is consistently outstanding across modes."]
